医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人脑学习效率的秘密揭晓MRC 大脑网络动力学部门和牛津大学计算机科学系的研究人员提出了一个新原理来解释大脑在学习过程中如何调整神经元之间的连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/The-secret-to- human-brains-learning-efficiency-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/The-secret-to- human-brains-learning-efficiency-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a51208a-a9df-4164-967a-5fc14df31d44 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 19:43:00 -0500 The secret to human brain's learning efficiency revealed
基因编辑的突破：增强的病毒样颗粒有望开启遗传病治疗的新纪元研究人员开发了一种先进的主编辑工程病毒样颗粒（PE-eVLP）系统，显着提高了人类细胞的基因编辑效率，并显示出治疗遗传疾病的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Breakthrough-in-gene-editing-Enhanced-virus-like-articles-promise-new-era-in-genic-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Breakthrough-in-gene-editing-Enhanced-virus-like-articles-promise-new-era-in-genic-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=056c546a-aa1e-4f2b-9c17-11851fee9f9d Tue, 09 Jan 2024 19:32:00 -0500 Breakthrough in gene editing: Enhanced virus-like particles promise new era in genetic disease treatment
杜撰的还是真实的？审查揭穿了与面罩相关的干眼综合症的严重性《Eye》杂志上的一篇评论发现，在 COVID-19 大流行期间长时间使用口罩可能会导致轻微的眼部刺激，但不太可能出现严重的眼部并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/MADE-up-or-real-Review-debunks-severity-of-mask-linked-dry-eye-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/MADE-up-or-real-Review-debunks-severity-of-mask-linked-dry-eye-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a82da406-7725-48c2-8b1b-1fc70d1eee89 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 19:04:00 -0500 MADE-up or real? Review debunks severity of mask-associated dry eye syndrome
研究将早期屏幕时间与幼儿的非典型感觉处理联系起来接触电视或视频的婴儿和幼儿可能更有可能表现出非典型的感官行为，例如对活动不投入和不感兴趣，在环境中寻求更强烈的刺激，或者被响亮的声音或明亮的灯光等感觉淹没。德雷克塞尔医学院研究人员的数据今天发表在《美国医学会儿科杂志》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-links-early-screen-time-to-atropic-sensory-processing-in-toddlers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-links-early-screen-time-to-atropic-sensory-processing-in-toddlers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e0fc894-1a7f-4ed8-964d-27468a63081c Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:52:22 -0500 Study links early screen time to atypical sensory processing in toddlers
研究：生活水平较高的国家中性别之间的心理差异仍然存在卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员在《心理科学展望》上发表了一篇文章，表明在生活水平较高的国家，性别之间的心理差异仍然存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-Psychological-differences- Between-sexes-persist-in-countries-with-higher-standards-of-living.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-Psychological-differences- Between-sexes-persist-in-countries-with-higher-standards-of-living.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b370f6f9-9fe0-41bf-86c0-c4d2e5c1966b Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:39:39 -0500 Study: Psychological differences between sexes persist in countries with higher standards of living
食品教育计划使孩子们能够在数年后选择新鲜、美味的食物为了鼓励年轻人消费水果和蔬菜，社区和学校都增加了园艺和烹饪课程等体验式食品教育项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Food-education-program-empowers-kids-to-choose-fresh-flavorful-food-years-later.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Food-education-program-empowers-kids-to-choose-fresh-flavorful-food-years-later.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff8d50b-71c7-47b6-af94-dc60254e4437 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:35:04 -0500 Food education program empowers kids to choose fresh, flavorful food years later
急性家庭医院模式有望提高患者满意度和治疗结果自 2020 年医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心推出家庭急性医院护理 (AHCaH) 豁免以来，来自 37 个州 300 家医院的数千名患者在家中接受了治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Acute-hospital-at-home-model-shows-promise-for-boosting-病人-satisfaction-and-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Acute-hospital-at-home-model-shows-promise-for-boosting-病人-satisfaction-and-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3db3a21c-2733-4572-9d10-3ceadf5aacd3 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:31:36 -0500 Acute hospital at home model shows promise for boosting patient satisfaction and outcomes
研究表明青少年心肺健康水平较低与中年心脏病风险增加有关于韦斯屈莱大学进行的一项长期跟踪研究表明，青少年时期心肺健康水平较低与中年时期患心血管和代谢疾病的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-links-low-cardiorespiratory-fitness-in-adolescent-to-increased-middle-age-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-links-low-cardiorespiratory-fitness-in-adolescent-to-increased-middle-age-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b165b317-87a2-4418-ad7b-c63fcdd20018 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:25:46 -0500 Study links low cardiorespiratory fitness in adolescence to increased middle-age heart disease risk
研究表明，子宫内接触 PFAS 会影响未出生的孩子PFAS 是可能导致癌症、糖尿病和其他疾病的化学物质。厄勒布鲁大学的研究现在表明，这些化学物质早在胎儿发育阶段就会影响人类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/In-utero-exposure-to-PFAS-affects-the-unborn-child-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/In-utero-exposure-to-PFAS-affects-the-unborn-child-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecc965b-169b-4af1-9600-b1c5ea36a331 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:19:41 -0500 In utero exposure to PFAS affects the unborn child, study suggests
神经母细胞瘤儿童可能受益于新药混合物一项新的试验发现，患有神经母细胞瘤（一种在神经细胞中发生的罕见癌症）的儿童可能会受益于接受某些抗肿瘤药物和化疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Children-with-neuroblastomas-may-benefit-from-new-drug-cocktail.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Children-with-neuroblastomas-may-benefit-from-new-drug-cocktail.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=392ea81a-944e-4dfc-a​​4aa-b2e326a7f0fa Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:14:15 -0500 Children with neuroblastomas may benefit from new drug cocktail
